title: Hibernate finds a new Home at Commonhaus Foundation
content: For the past two decades, Hibernate, a cornerstone of Java data persistence, has thrived under the stewardship of JBoss and Red Hat. Today, the project announces a significant shift: its move to the Commonhaus Foundation, a neutral ground for open-source projects. Why the Move? As discussed in the announcement, while Red Hatâ€™s support has been ...  The post appeared first on .
